org.apache.giraph.utils

类 ConfigurationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.utils.ConfigurationUtils

  • public final class ConfigurationUtils
extends Object
    Translate command line args into Configuration Key-Value pairs.

    • 方法详细资料

      • parseArgs

        public static org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine parseArgs(GiraphConfiguration giraphConf,
                                           String[] args)
                                                    throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                           org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException,
                                                           IOException
        Translate CLI arguments to GiraphRunner or 'bin/hadoop jar' into Configuration Key-Value pairs.
        参数:
        giraphConf - the current job Configuration.
        args - the raw CLI args to parse
        返回:
        a CommandLine object, or null if the job run should exit.
        抛出:
        ClassNotFoundException
        org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
        IOException

      • addOption

        public static void addOption(String opt,
             String longOpt,
             boolean hasArg,
             String description)
        Callers can place additional options to be parsed and stored in our job's GiraphConfiguration via this utility call. These options will ONLY be parsed and placed into the CommandLine returned from parseArgs Calling code must query this CommandLine to take action on these options.
        参数:
        opt - short options name, i.e. -h
        longOpt - long option name, i.e. --help
        hasArg - should we expect an argument for this option?
        description - English description of this option.
